# 22nd Forqué Awards

The 22nd  ceremony of the Forqué Awards was held on 14 January 2017 at the Teatro de la Maestranza in Seville. The gala was hosted by Carlos Latre.
History
The nominations were disclosed in December 2016.
Organised by  and broadcast on La 1, the ceremony was held at the Teatro de la Maestranza in Seville on 14 January 2017. It thus became the first ceremony of the Feroz Awards held outside Madrid. The gala featured musical performances by Jesse & Joy, Vanesa Martín, Diana Navarro and Arkano. It was hosted by Carlos Latre.
Antonio P. Pérez was gifted the EGEDA Gold Medal recognizing a career in the film industry.
